Dear guests, thank you for your recognition of the hotel. The hotel is very close to the newly opened Beijing Chaoyang Railway Station. It only takes 8 minutes to walk there. The transportation at the door is also very convenient. There are many places to eat out. The hotel is Hanting Version 2.7 is a new product in Hanting. The breakfast is very rich and there is a self-service free laundry. We look forward to your next stay.
